sentences.en: "Daniel," Pat said, her voice harsh with urgency. "Come out here immediately."

sentences.en: "We've come with good news," Pat said cheerfully.
sentences.cn: “我们带来了好消息，”帕特兴高采烈地说。

sentences.cn: 据曼迪说，帕特彪悍的外表下隐藏着一颗害羞且敏感的心。

sentences.en: Despite the film's merits I felt it was too pat.
